text: Evgeny Donskoy was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Gaël Monfils won the title after defeating Kwon Soon-woo 6–4, 2–6, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw OEC Kaohsiung - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 OEC Kaohsiung – Singles
